"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { PawPrint, Mail, Lock, User } from "lucide-react" import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" export default function SignUpPage() { const [fullName, setFullName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [error, setError] = useState("") const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() setError("") try { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/signup", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ name: fullName, email, password, }), }) const data = await response.text() if (response.ok) { console.log("User registered successfully:", data) navigate("/login") } else { setError(data || "Error registering user") console.error("Signup failed:", data) } } catch (error) { console.error("Error during signup:", error) setError("An error occurred. Please try again.") } } return (
